pageTitle: JOINDRE CAPITAL SERVICES LTD (JCS:Mumbai): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13750=Joindre Capital Services Ltd. announced that the Board of Directors of the company at its meeting held on May 29, 2015, has recommended a dividend of INR 0.75 per share on a face value of INR 10, subject To Approve the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting., 14375=Joindre Capital Services Ltd. announced that they will report Q4, 2015 results on May 29, 2015, 4834=Joindre Capital Services Limited provides share and stock broking services in India. The company offers institutional broking services to financial institutions, mutual funds, and banks for buying and selling of stocks, securities, and derivative products; trading services in future and options contracts; a range of mutual funds; IPOs; Internet based trading services; depository services; and corporate research services. It also provides portfolio management services. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Mumbai, India., 11103=Joindre Capital Services Ltd. reported audited standalone earnings results for the fourth quarter and audited standalone and consolidated earnings results for the year ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, on standalone basis, the company reported total income from operations of INR 53.572 million compared to INR 33.487 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from operation before other income, finance costs and exceptional items was INR 9.079 million compared to loss of INR 1.106 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 18.557 million compared INR 8.949 million for the same period a year ago. Net profit was INR 12.648 million or INR 0.91 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items compared to INR 6.203 million or INR 0.45 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items for the same period a year ago. For the year, on standalone basis, the company reported total income from operations of INR 195.676 million compared to INR 115.672 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from operation before other income, finance costs and exceptional items was INR 14.791 million compared to loss of INR 8.413 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 54.359 million compared INR 28.163 million for the same period a year ago. Net profit was INR 37.525 million or INR 2.71 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items compared to INR 19.427 million or INR 1.40 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items for the same period a year ago. For the year, on consolidated basis, the company reported total income from operations of INR 196.442 million compared to INR 117.330 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from operation before other income, finance costs and exceptional items was INR 14.875 million compared to loss of INR 8.027 million for the same period a year ago. Profit from ordinary activities before tax was INR 54.769 million compared INR 28.980 million for the same period a year ago. Net profit was INR 37.806 million or INR 2.73 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items compared to INR 19.991 million or INR 1.44 per basic and diluted share before/after exceptional items for the same period a year ago.}
